When a minor is applying for a job at a fast food restaurant, what is the average pay they would receive when beginning a new job in Ohio?
In: Business › Careers&Employment › Job
Rate This Answer
Minimum wage is the pay a new employee can expect in a fast food restaurant. Answered

Facebook Tweet Email Advertisement About Job
A job is providing a service to a company who will in turn compensate the employee for their work. Each job position provides a service to society; whether you're a CEO of a company, or a cashier, your function is benefiting society in one way or another. A job provides a stable source of income for individuals and families alike and at some point or another, everyone will experience what a job is like.
More about Job »
About Fast Food
''Fast food'' has become a regular part of people's vocabulary since the 1950's. The convenient, fast, and relatively cheap prices of fast food restaurants have made them some of the most popular stops for people on the move. Offering typical American foods like burgers, fries, and soft drinks, fast food restaurants have a definite American vibe and foothold.
